mapper.insert: insert into appraisal (create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, enable_, remark_, score) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update appraisal set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, enable_, remark_, score from appraisal
